Sentencas: Micro combined heat and power (micro-CHP) systems can efficiently provide private homes or small commercial buildings with both heat and electricity.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: The European industry is ramping up demonstration of fuel cell based micro-CHP units in the EU projects ene.field and PACE.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: Systems based on solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) and polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cells (PEMFC) have been demonstrated.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: More than 1,000 units have been tested in 10 European countries in the years 2012-2017.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: In the coming 5 years, additionally 2,500 units will be deployed via the EU funded program PACE.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: These field trials have been accompanied by analyses of end-user satisfaction, environmental impact, and costs involved.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: The end-users participating in the field trials had a very positive perception of the fuel cell micro-CHP technology.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: The environmental impact of fuel cell micro-CHP was compared to that of heat pumps and gas condensing boilers in a life cycle assessment (LCA).
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: The micro-CHP units have a better environmental performance than these competing technologies in all the analyzed use-cases.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: Today, the capital costs of fuel cell based micro-CHP are significantly higher than that of traditional heating technologies.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe

Sentencas: However, as serial production begins, economies of scale will cause the costs to drop substantially and the micro-CHP can become economically competitive.
Titulo: Status on Demonstration of Fuel Cell Based Micro-CHP Units in Europe
